about_the_game:
GAME CURRENTLY IN EARLY STAGES OF DEVELOPMENT / SCREENSHOTS AND GAME MECHANICS NOT FINAL

Welcome to Flumenborg, the city that never sleeps... mainly because people are afraid that you'll rob them blind while they do!

"Break, Enter, Repeat" thrusts you into the exciting world of burglaries, set against the frosty backdrop of the Cold War era. You are the architect of your own destiny, plotting burglaries from cosy homes to fortified government agencies, and from jewellery stores to museums, all while navigating the murky waters of espionage and intrigue.

🏠 Plan the perfect heist: Strategise your way from humble suburban homes to high-profile targets. Every decision matters as you climb the criminal ladder in a city brimming with wealth and risk.

🔦 Choose your own approach: Go in with a bang or be stealthy. Plan everything carefully in advance or improvise. The choice is yours!

📉 Risks and reward: Face the consequences of your actions, be it a stint in prison or a hospital stay. Manage your time wisely, as the clock never ceases to tick! Will you retire to a life of luxury, or will you spend the rest of your days behind bars?

👥 Play solo or with friends: Experience the main story-driven campaign and sandbox modes by yourself. Or team up with up to 3 other accomplices in real-time co-op multiplayer. Coordinate with your crew to plan the ultimate heist, or improvise when everything (almost inevitably) goes wrong.

🏗️ Create and share levels: Use the built-in level editor to design your own burglary scenarios. Craft intricate maps filled with loot, security systems and challenges to play with friends or share with the world via Steam Workshop.

👥 Recruit your crew: Recruit a diverse team of specialists from the smoky corners of the friendly neighbourhood pub. Each member brings unique skills: lockpicking, disguise, electronics, demolition, stealth, and more.

💎 Fence your goods: Offload your ill-gotten gains at art collectors, shady pawn shops, or high-end delicatessen stores. But beware, the market is savvy, and your rewards will depend on your character's skills. The same artifact might be a gem to one, but a trinket to another. It's not just about stealing... it's about stealing smart.

🎓 Skill progression: Evolve your character's skills through hands-on experience. The more you pick locks, sweet-talk guards, or fence stolen items, the better you become. Your success depends on your expertise! Stealth, agility, strength, electronics, driving, first aid, disguise, persuasion, demolition, lockpicking, appraisal (to avoid selling a Picasso for the price of a pizza), and negotiation. All these skills are at your disposal. Make the most out of them!

🕵️‍♂️ Cold War undertones: Get entangled in the web of espionage as government agencies seek your particular set of skills. Steal classified documents, engage in industrial espionage, and make allies (or enemies) in the shadowy world of covert operations.

🗒️ Discovery awaits: Piece together the stories of key figures and the city's lore through newspaper clippings, old photos, personal letters and other items you'll encounter during your heists.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: "Break, Enter, Repeat" is a strategic burglary sim set in the Cold War era, where you plan & execute heists in the city of Flumenborg. Recruit crew members, improve your skills, gather tools and intelligence, fence stolen goods, and navigate a city teeming with targets in this indie game!
